description: Generate realistic fake data across 23 categories, from people and finance to internet, images, and more. Accelerate testing, prototyping, seeding, and demos with hundreds of ready-made generators. Customize formats like names, addresses, dates, colors, and IDs to match your scenarios.

capabilities.name: airline-airline-iataCode
capabilities.description: Generates a random airline IATA code.

capabilities.name: airline-airport-iataCode
capabilities.description: Generates a random airport IATA code.

capabilities.name: airline-airplane-iataTypeCode
capabilities.description: Generates a random airplane IATA type code.

capabilities.name: airline-airplane-name
capabilities.description: Generates a random airplane model name.

capabilities.name: airline-recordLocator
capabilities.description: Generates a random record locator (booking reference number).

capabilities.name: color-human
capabilities.description: Returns a random human-readable color name.

capabilities.name: color-space
capabilities.description: Returns a random color space name from the worldwide accepted color spaces.

capabilities.name: color-cssSupportedFunction
capabilities.description: Returns a random css supported color function name.

capabilities.name: color-cssSupportedSpace
capabilities.description: Returns a random css supported color space name.

capabilities.name: color-colorByCSSColorSpace
capabilities.description: Returns a random color based on CSS color space specified.

capabilities.name: commerce-department
capabilities.description: Returns a department inside a shop.

capabilities.name: commerce-productName
capabilities.description: Generates a random descriptive product name.

capabilities.name: commerce-price
capabilities.description: Generates a price between min and max (inclusive).

capabilities.name: commerce-productAdjective
capabilities.description: Returns an adjective describing a product.

capabilities.name: commerce-productMaterial
capabilities.description: Returns a material of a product.

capabilities.name: company-catchPhrase
capabilities.description: Generates a random catch phrase that can be displayed to an end user.

capabilities.name: company-buzzPhrase
capabilities.description: Generates a random buzz phrase that can be used to demonstrate data being viewed by a manager.

capabilities.name: company-catchPhraseAdjective
capabilities.description: Returns a random catch phrase adjective that can be displayed to an end user.

capabilities.name: company-catchPhraseDescriptor
capabilities.description: Returns a random catch phrase descriptor that can be displayed to an end user.

capabilities.name: company-catchPhraseNoun
capabilities.description: Returns a random catch phrase noun that can be displayed to an end user.

capabilities.name: company-buzzAdjective
capabilities.description: Returns a random buzz adjective that can be used to demonstrate data being viewed by a manager.

capabilities.name: company-buzzVerb
capabilities.description: Returns a random buzz verb that can be used to demonstrate data being viewed by a manager.

capabilities.name: company-buzzNoun
capabilities.description: Returns a random buzz noun that can be used to demonstrate data being viewed by a manager.

capabilities.name: database-column
capabilities.description: Returns a random database column name.

capabilities.name: database-type
capabilities.description: Returns a random database column type.

capabilities.name: date-anytime
capabilities.description: Generates a random date that can be either in the past or in the future.

capabilities.name: date-past
capabilities.description: Generates a random date in the past.

capabilities.name: date-future
capabilities.description: Generates a random date in the future.

capabilities.name: date-between
capabilities.description: Generates a random date between the given boundaries.

capabilities.name: date-betweens
capabilities.description: Generates random dates between the given boundaries. The dates will be returned in an array sorted in chronological order.

capabilities.name: date-recent
capabilities.description: Generates a random date in the recent past.

capabilities.name: date-soon
capabilities.description: Generates a random date in the near future.

capabilities.name: date-month
capabilities.description: Returns a random name of a month.

capabilities.name: date-weekday
capabilities.description: Returns a random day of the week.

capabilities.name: date-timeZone
capabilities.description: Returns a random IANA time zone name.

capabilities.name: date-birthdate
capabilities.description: Returns a random birthdate. By default, the birthdate is generated for an adult between 18 and 80 years old. But you can customize the 'age' range or the 'year' range to generate a more specific birthdate.

capabilities.name: finance-amount
capabilities.description: Generates a random amount between the given bounds (inclusive).

capabilities.name: finance-bic
capabilities.description: Generates a random SWIFT/BIC code based on the ISO-9362 format.

capabilities.name: finance-creditCardCVV
capabilities.description: Generates a random credit card CVV.

capabilities.name: finance-creditCardIssuer
capabilities.description: Returns a random credit card issuer.

capabilities.name: finance-creditCardNumber
capabilities.description: Generates a random credit card number.

capabilities.name: finance-currency
capabilities.description: Returns a random currency object, containing code, name, symbol, and numericCode properties.

capabilities.name: finance-currencyNumericCode
capabilities.description: Returns a random currency numeric code.

capabilities.name: finance-ethereumAddress
capabilities.description: Creates a random, non-checksum Ethereum address.

capabilities.name: food-ethnicCategory
capabilities.description: Generates a random food's ethnic category.

capabilities.name: git-commitEntry
capabilities.description: Generates a random commit entry as printed by `git log`.

capabilities.name: git-commitDate
capabilities.description: Generates a date string for a git commit using the same format as `git log`.

capabilities.name: hacker-ingverb
capabilities.description: Returns a random hacker/IT verb for continuous actions (en: ing suffix; e.g. hacking).

capabilities.name: image-avatar
capabilities.description: Generates a random avatar image url.

capabilities.name: image-avatarGitHub
capabilities.description: Generates a random avatar from GitHub.

capabilities.name: image-personPortrait
capabilities.description: Generates a random square portrait (avatar) of a person. These are static images of fictional people created by an AI, Stable Diffusion 3.

capabilities.name: image-avatarLegacy
capabilities.description: Generates a random avatar from `https://cloudflare-ipfs.com/ipfs/Qmd3W5DuhgHirLHGVixi6V76LhCkZUz6pnFt5AJBiyvHye/avatar`. (Deprecated: The links are no longer working. Use `avatar()` instead.)

capabilities.name: image-urlLoremFlickr
capabilities.description: Generates a random image url provided via https://loremflickr.com.

capabilities.name: image-urlPicsumPhotos
capabilities.description: Generates a random image url provided via https://picsum.photos.

capabilities.name: image-urlPlaceholder
capabilities.description: Generates a random image url provided via https://via.placeholder.com/. (Deprecated: The service has bad uptime. Use `faker.image.url()` or `faker.image.dataUri()` instead.)

capabilities.name: image-dataUri
capabilities.description: Generates a random data uri containing an URL-encoded SVG image or a Base64-encoded SVG image.

capabilities.name: internet-email
capabilities.description: Generates an email address using the given person's name as base.

capabilities.name: internet-exampleEmail
capabilities.description: Generates an email address using an example mail provider using the given person's name as base.

capabilities.name: internet-userName
capabilities.description: Generates a username using the given person's name as base. (Deprecated: Use `faker.internet.username()` instead.)

capabilities.name: internet-username
capabilities.description: Generates a username using the given person's name as base.

capabilities.name: internet-displayName
capabilities.description: Generates a display name using the given person's name as base.

capabilities.name: internet-protocol
capabilities.description: Returns a random web protocol. Either `http` or `https`.

capabilities.name: internet-httpStatusCode
capabilities.description: Generates a random HTTP status code.

capabilities.name: internet-ip
capabilities.description: Generates a random IPv4 or IPv6 address.

capabilities.name: internet-userAgent
capabilities.description: Generates a random user agent string.

capabilities.name: internet-color
capabilities.description: Generates a random css hex color code in aesthetically pleasing color palette. (Deprecated: Please use faker.color.rgb() or any of the other color methods instead.)

capabilities.name: internet-jwtAlgorithm
capabilities.description: Generates a random JWT (JSON Web Token) Algorithm.

capabilities.name: internet-jwt
capabilities.description: Generates a random JWT (JSON Web Token).

capabilities.name: location-cardinalDirection
capabilities.description: Returns a random cardinal direction (north, east, south, west).

capabilities.name: location-city
capabilities.description: Generates a random localized city name.

capabilities.name: location-countryCode
capabilities.description: Returns a random ISO_3166-1 country code.

capabilities.name: location-county
capabilities.description: Returns a random localized county, or other equivalent second-level administrative entity for the locale's country such as a district or department.

capabilities.name: location-direction
capabilities.description: Returns a random direction (cardinal and ordinal; northwest, east, etc).

capabilities.name: location-nearbyGPSCoordinate
capabilities.description: Generates a random GPS coordinate within the specified radius from the given coordinate.

capabilities.name: location-ordinalDirection
capabilities.description: Returns a random ordinal direction (northwest, southeast, etc).

capabilities.name: location-secondaryAddress
capabilities.description: Generates a random localized secondary address. This refers to a specific location at a given address such as an apartment or room number.

capabilities.name: location-state
capabilities.description: Returns a random state, or other equivalent first-level administrative entity for the locale's country such as a province, region, or prefecture.

capabilities.name: location-streetAddress
capabilities.description: Generates a random localized street address.

capabilities.name: location-zipCode
capabilities.description: Generates a random localized zip code.

capabilities.name: lorem-word
capabilities.description: Generates a word of a specified length.

capabilities.name: lorem-words
capabilities.description: Generates a space separated list of words.

capabilities.name: lorem-sentence
capabilities.description: Generates a space separated list of words beginning with a capital letter and ending with a period.

capabilities.name: lorem-slug
capabilities.description: Generates a slugified text consisting of the given number of hyphen separated words.

capabilities.name: lorem-sentences
capabilities.description: Generates the given number of sentences.

capabilities.name: lorem-paragraph
capabilities.description: Generates a paragraph with the given number of sentences.

capabilities.name: lorem-paragraphs
capabilities.description: Generates the given number of paragraphs.

capabilities.name: lorem-text
capabilities.description: Generates a random text based on a random lorem method.

capabilities.name: lorem-lines
capabilities.description: Generates the given number lines of lorem separated by '\n'.

capabilities.name: person-sexType
capabilities.description: Returns a random sex type. The `SexType` is intended to be used in parameters and conditions.

capabilities.name: science-chemicalElement
capabilities.description: Returns a random periodic table element.

capabilities.name: system-fileName
capabilities.description: Returns a random file name with extension.

capabilities.name: system-commonFileName
capabilities.description: Returns a random file name with a given extension or a commonly used extension.

capabilities.name: system-commonFileType
capabilities.description: Returns a commonly used file type.

capabilities.name: system-commonFileExt
capabilities.description: Returns a commonly used file extension.

capabilities.name: vehicle-vrm
capabilities.description: Returns a vehicle registration number (Vehicle Registration Mark - VRM).

capabilities.name: word-sample
capabilities.description: Returns a random word, that can be an adjective, adverb, conjunction, interjection, noun, preposition, or verb.

capabilities.name: word-words
capabilities.description: Returns a random string containing some words separated by spaces.
